globalProperty.description: This should be a comma-separated string of Concept IDs defining the Lab Tests supported by this system. These Concepts must have a ConceptClass of either LabSet or Test. A Concept of class LabSet will support entry of all Test Concepts in the LabSet together. The LabSet would represent the type of Test (ie. Hematology) and the Tests within this set would represent the individual Results (ie. Hematocrit, Hemoglobin, etc.). If only a single Test with a single result is desired, then a Concept of class Test may be added to the list directly.
This should be the OrderTypeId of the OrderType that represents a Lab Test Order
This should be the EncounterTypeId of the EncounterType that represents a Lab Test Encounter
This should be the PatientIdentifierTypeId for the PatientIdentifierType that will be used for listing, searching, and creating patients
The PersonAttributeTypeId for the PersonAttributeType representing the Patient's Health Center

In Patient Lists, we will display the Current State for the PatientProgram for the Program configured by this property. This is used in conjunction with the "workflowToDisplay" property. This should be the name of the program, not the id. For example - "HIV PROGRAM"

In Patient Lists, we will display the Current State for the PatientProgram for the ProgramWorkflow configured by this property. This is used in conjunction with the "programToDisplay" property. This should be the name of the workflow, not the id. For example, "ANTIRETROVIRAL TREATMENT GROUP"
